column4: hi all can anyone give me a few pointers getting me broadcom 4306 wireless card working on dapper.  I have tried loads of different bits from tutorials but am not getting anywhere.  Did have it working in the past but reformatted and now can't remember what i did.  I can get the little blue light come on on the laptop but it is not finding any networks
can anyone tell me what i need to do to check what drivers i currently have loaded, i have got a bit confused after trying so many tutorials to get this wireless card working
can anyone see what i am typing?
